div.head: hed' court
div.p:
Curia Capitalis burgi de abirdene in pretorio eiusdem xixo
die mensis aprilis Anno Domini Millesimo quadringentesimo nonagesimo
quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes patent in Rotulo sectis

div.head: assisa ad Inquisicionem per Dauid theman
div.p:
Johannes Knollis alexander rede thomas fyf Johannes Wormet murthacus
glenmaluyn Dauid mathesone alexander Watsone alexander gray Willelmus andir
sone senior Johannes lundoris Andreas culan Junior Robertus crage
alexander nachty Andreas Waus et thomas chapman Jurati dicunt
quod quondam dominus siue frater alexander theman frater germanus Dauid theman burgensis
de abirdene obiit vltimo vestitus et sasitus ut de feodo ad pacem et
fidem domini nostri Regis de quadam terra interiore Jacente infra dictum burgum
in vico castri ex australi parte eiusdem vici inter terram Johannis Wormet
ex occidentali parte ex vna et terram quo Johannis sanclar et terram quondam Roberti Jhonson'
ex orientali partibus ex altera et terram quondam magistri thome Waus versus boriam
et torrentem Sancte trinitatis versus austrum Et quod dictus Dauid est legittimus et
propinquior heres dicti quondam fratris suj de dicta terra interiore cum libero
introitu et egressu ad portam anteriorem terre anterioris Et quod est legittime
etatis Et quod dicta terra valet nunc per annum xx s' et tantum valuit tempore
pacis et quod tenetur in capite de Suppremo domino nostro Rege per seruicium
burgagium debitum et consuetum Et nunc existit in manibus Suppremi
dominj nostri Regis per tres aut quatuor menses in defectu heredis Jus suum
nomine prosequentis cum libero Introitu et exitu ad portam anteriore terre Anterioris

Eodem die Johannes Knollis accedens ad barram protestatus fuit pro vno
annuo redditu decim s' sibi annuatim debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente
in vico furcarum ex occidentali parte eiusdem vici Inter terram Roberti
blinsele ex Australi'Australi' overwrites 'boriali'. et terram alexandri logy ex boreali ad quam terram
accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis
in sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam secundo die huius processus alexandro
logy Andrea Scot et alexandro allansone seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram Willelmus Coupar et protestatus fuit
pro vno annuo redditu sex s' sibi annuatim debit' de quadam terra vasta
Jacente in superiore parte vici nauium inter terram Donaldi gylfillane
ex orientali et terram dicti Willelmi ex occidentali et communionem viam regiam versus
boriam ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram
et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam tercio die
huius processus Testibus Dauid gichtane Dauid Robertsone et phi
lippo de Dunbrek seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram sponsa thome rolland' et nomine dicti
sponsi sui protestatus fuit pro vno annuo Redditu quibus s' sibi annuatim
debit' de quadam terra vasta iacente in vico furcarum ex occidentali parte eiusdem
vici inter terram Dauid prat ex australi et terram Eduardi top ex boreali
ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides
quos ballivis in sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam quarto die huius processus Testibus
Willelmo Vmfray Roberto tailyour et Duncano straloche seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram alexander rede pro hac vice procuratore admissus
dominj de bernys et protestatus fuit pro vno annuo redditu sex s' sibi
annuatim debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico
inferiore ecclesie ex boriali parte eiusdem vici inter terram alexandri sanquhar
ex australi ex vna et terram Jacobi Kennarty ex orientali partibus
ex altera Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram
et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam primo
die huius processus Testibus Dauid Robertsone alexandro talyour et thoma
Jamesone seriando

Eodem die perlectis tribus processibus per magistrum Andream Cadiow de
et super recuperacione proprietatis et possessionis cuiusdam terre vaste Jacentis infra
dictum burgensem in le hukstarraw inter terram Dauid hile ex orientali
et terram patricij Coupar occidentali in defectu solucionis vnius annuj redditus
Sex s' et octo d' dicto magistro andree a longo tempore debit' et non solut' vnde
thomas fyf procurator dicti magistri andree in hac parte peciit a balliuis
secundum formam suj processus precedentis Juris et iusticie complementum Tunc
Curia mature auisiata decreuit quod prefatus magister Andreas possessionem
et proprietatem dicte terre legittime recuperauit in defectu solucionis dicti annuj
redditus Et hoc ex ore Johannis Williamsone Judicatoris Curie pro
iudicio data fuit teste Curia

Eodem die perlectis tribus processibus per dictum Willelmum cruksch
ank capellanum altaris beati Duthaci infra ecclesiam parrochiale de abirdene
situati de et super recuperacione proprietatis et possessionis cuiusdam terre vaste
Jacentis infra dictum burgum in le skulhile inter terram magistri Duncanj scherar
ex orientali et terram thome meldrum ex occidentali et communionem viam regiam ex australi
et terram Andree michelsone versus boriam in defectu solucionis vnius annuum Red
ditus Sex s' et octo d' sibi et dicto altari debit' a longo tempore et non solut'
vnde thomas fyf prelocutor dicti capellanj peciit a ballivis secundum formam suj processus
precedentis Juris et Justicie complementum Tunc Curia mature auisiata
decreuit quod prefatus dominus Willelmus possessionem et proprietatem dicte terre
legittime recuperauit in defectu solucionis dicti annuj redditus Et hoc ex
ore Johannis Williamsone Judicatoris Curie pro iudicio data fuit teste
Curia

Eodem die continuatur Judicium processus predicatorum fratrum prioris continuatur vsque in
proximam Curiam Capitalem

Eodem die continuatur Judicium processus thome rolland vsque ad proximam
Curiam Capitalem

Penultimo die aprilis anno quo supra In presencia balliuorum thomas prat deuenit
plegius ad conseruandum Walterum mernis indempnem per thomam litill Jonhne'
de tribus barrellis farrine et duabus barrellis salij ab eodem Waltero receptis

the Sext day of maij the yer forsaide the aldirman consale ande communite
conducit and feit William ray thar common' hyrd to keip the nolt of the
haile tovne for this yere instant that is to say to alhallouday nexte
hereftir And' Ilkan cow sal pay him vj d' and Ilkan stirk iij d' tharof Ilkan
cow sal pay him ij d' in hand in onwartis of his fee And the saide Wil
yeam sal mak the said gudis be kepit fra al skath as efferis

Tercio die Junij Anno Domini et cetera Nonagesimo Andreas cantuly accusatus
fuit pro forestallacione burgi in empcione lane ac pro forestalla
cione burgi in empcione pellium quas forrestallaciones dictus Andreas negavit
et consequenter huiusmodi actiones posite fuerunt ad assisam que mature
auisiata decreuit quod nequierat determinare huiusmodi debat' protunc quapropter continuavit
easdem vsque ad vicesimum diem legittimum proximo futuro et ordinavit eundem Andream ad
inueniendum plegium pro suo Introitu coram preposito et ballivis dicto die responsurus
actionibus prenotatis et consequenter Robertus blinsel deuenit plegius per manum
ad intrandum prefatum andream vt premissum est quj obligatur ad releuandum
eundem Robertum de huiusmodi fideiussione

Eodem die Willelmus nicholsone calumpniatus fuit andream cantuly pro
iniusta detencione ab eo vnius barrelle salmonum quam Idem andreas dene
gauit et consequenter huiusmodi actio posita fuit ad assisam que mature
auisiata continuavit hanc actionem vsque ad vicesimum legittimum diem proximo futuro et
ordinauit dictum Willelmum ad producendum vnum testum aut plures pro verificacione
sue actionis
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xv die Junij Anno Domini et cetera nonagesimo

the quhilk day it was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' mastir Androw cadiow
talisman that mathou Culane aw to haue ane ayrschipe as ane burges
ayre suld' haue that is the best of al manere of gudis that his brothir thomas
of culane hed' possessit and breukit peciably' vnsald' the tyme of his
deces' And' assignez to mathou Culane the thrid day of Julij next
to cum to prewe quhat gudis the saide thomas hed' in the tyme of his
deces'

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxiij die Junij
anno quosupra

The quhilk day comperit William nicholsone befor the balyeis and producit
in Jugement ane testimoniale vndir the Sele of Jonhne colison ane of
the balyeis of banf declarand' and making' mencion' that Androw cantuly
come borghe' and dettour to the said Wilyeame for j barrel of Salmond' And'
the saide Androw and his procuratouris was lauchfullie callit to her' and se
the said testimoniale producit ande comperit nocht quhilk day was assignit
tharto eftir tenor' of the ak maide tharapone obefore
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio tercio die Julij Anno quo supra

the samyn day the actione and clame of arschipe depending' vndecidit
betuix mathow Culan one that ane part and Agnes club the relict of vmquhile
thomas culan his brothir one that vthir part contenit in the ak obefor is continevit
with consent of the saide mathou becaus' the said Agnes was sek and
comperit nocht nor yet nay procuratour for hir quhile monunday cum aucht
dais the xij day of Julij instant in siclik forme strintht and effect as obefor
but preiudice tile ony party

The saide day it was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' thomas prat talisman
that gif mastir Jonhne badenaghe' has othir preve or witnes to preif that Androw
lousone was takisman of his half nethis fischingis of mydchingile the saide
Androw sal pay the maile of the samyn of this yer' And' gif the said mastir Jhon'
gettis nay preve nor witnes than the said Androw sal suer' he was nocht his takisman
of the said fischingis and than the said mastir Jonhne sal pay the saide maile
and the aldirman and balyeis assignit monunday that next cumis to the saide
mastir Jonhne to bring his previs or witnes

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos quinto die aprilis anno
quo supra

the samyn day mastir Jonhne badenaghe' falyeit in his preve and
witnes in contrar' Androw lousone anent the tak of ane demi nethis fischingis
of midchingile and the maile of the samyn this instant yere and was made
to pay the saide maile And' the saide Androw was quyt of his chal
lance

the saide day philp Dunbrek oblist him to Sett Souerte to thome
menyeis betuix this ande thurisday next to cum to pay him j barrel salmond' the next fischinge And' gif he falyeis
to pay him fiwe markis for the said' j barrele of Salmond' the said'
thomas deliuerand' him his geir that is to say j countour ane almary and j cher'
in siclik pley as he tuk it

The saide day frer Jonhne penny priour of the blakfreris grantit him pait
be the handis of philp of Dunbrek xiij merkis of the kingis pensione aucht
be the towne And' frer' Jonhne retre priour of the quhit freris grantit
him pait of fiwe merkis of the kingis pension' aucht to thame
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio Sexto die Julij Anno quo supra

the quhilk day thomas Wl meldrvm was callit lauchfullie and nocht
comperit and Alexander allansone seriand' passit to his butht and warnit him thar' and
comprehendit him nocht quharfor Sene he comperit nocht as he promittit the
said day befor the aldirman and balyeis to haue hed' ane declaracion
betuix him and Jok Wricht anent the prenteischipe the said Jonhe Wricht
was fundin quyt of his clame

The saide day it was deliuerit be ane assis' Jonhne' of Knollis talisman that
gyf William gareauche eldar wald' suer' the gretht aithe he bocht the
merchandice and gudis fra Robenot franchman as thai war' sald' to vthiris in
the towne
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xij die Julij Anno quosupra T

The quhilk day it was deliuerit ordanit and decretit be the aldirman
balyeis Consale and communite warnit be the bell gathtreit and circualie
Inquerit be philp Dunbrek officiare anent the pament of jC lib'
of taxt grantit and extentit for thar part of the taxt tile our Soueran
lordis mariage that the officiaris that Intromettit with the saide taxt
sal fre the tone and sal pas' one thar avne expens' with the officiaris
that now ar to mak compt rekning and pament of the samyn tile our
Souerane lordis thesaurare and to bringe hame ane acquitance tharof to the
towne within the terme contenit in our' Souerane lordis lettres of charge
cumin tharapone quhilk is foure dais or ellis thar gudis sale be
distrenyeit for the pament of the saide jC li' Ande thar be ony man
within the towne that aw ony part of the taxt the officiaris and the tone sale
pas' with thame and furyn thame to be pait

The xiij day of Julij In presens of the aldirman balyeis and the
mast part of the consale Jonhne of Retre oblist him to pay
the annuele Rent of xiij s' and iiij d' of the land that his modir was
in coniunctfeftment of liand' in the castalgat to the chaplannis
of the college of Abirdene or ellis cum one friday befor the
balyeis and derenye the pundis of the samyn with the perell of law

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per ballivos
xix die Julij Anno quo supra

The samyne day the qbalyeis balyeis consale and communite gathtreit for the tym
deliuerit and ordanit the last generale assedacion maide and Selit vndir
thar common' Sele of thar wattiris and fischingis and landis be reformit agan
And' that nane duelland' vteuche the towne breuk ony tak of thar
fredome in tymes to Cum quhilkis was warnit opinly be the hand' bele
throw the haile towne and gathtreit for the tyme And' thai chesit thir persons
vndir writin that is to say sere Jonhne ruthirfurd' aldirman Alexander chamer of
murchile Robert blinsele Dauid menyeis yongar Alexander Red' Jonhne
Colisone thomas fyf thomas prat and Jonhne Wormet thar commissaris to be suorne
and reforme the said' assedacion' And' ordanit the saidis thomas prat ande
Jonhne Wormet keparis of thar commone Sele to Sele the said' commi
ssion' with the samyne Sele witnes Alexander Iruyne of lunnay Wilye
ame Abirdour sere Robert leis notar sereis alexander club Jonhne strachin mathow
nicholsone Androw gray chaplannis and vthir diuers' to giddir with alexander
menyeis Robert blinsele Dauid menyeis Jonhne colison' and Androw murray eldar

the saide day it was fundin and deliuerit be the aldirman balyeis and
Consale that the chaplannis of the College of abirdene sal Joys'
breuk and rays' the annuell Rent of xiij s' and iiij d' gevin to tham
be vmquhile Androw Retre of the land' pertening to Jonhne Retre
his sone off the quhilk his modir is in coniunctfeftment liand' in the
castalgate betuix the lande of Dauid Kintor one the Est parte
and' the land' of Robert blinsele on the west parte vnto the
tyme thai be infeft in alsmekile annuell of ane vthir land' als stren
yeabile sufficient and liand' in als' gud' grond' eftir the tenor' of the
evidenc' vndir the Sele of thomas fyff balye for the tyme and the hand'
of sere Robert leis notar befor thame producit and Rede

In the balye court of Abirden' haldin the xx day of Julij the yer forsaide Symon
gardin was conuikit be ane assis' for the strubulance of mastir Alexander
fyf

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos secundo die augusti anno Domini
et cetera nonagesimo

the samyn day clays quhit mastir vndir god of the litill
bus' follouit Jonhne of lammyntone Dauid spens cristy prat thom'
gledstane James Kennarty yongar Duncan lammynton' Androw murray
youngar and William andirson' for the fraucht of Certane gudis eftir the
tenor' of the chartir party maide betuix thame tharapone quhilk was
put to the determinacion of ane assis' of thir personis vndir writin
that is to say thomez fyf alexander gray James andirson William
Vmfray William cryne Jonhne steuart alexander sanchar Androw murray
eldar and Jonhne thomson' slugy quhilkis fand' the saide merchandis quyt
of fracht becaus' thai offerit thar gudis in the schip and war nocht tane in

add.foreign: Statutum pistoris brasiatricum carnificum et cetera

div.p:
The thrid day of August It was statut and ordanit be the aldirman
and consale that ale baxtaris haue redy bakin brede tua penny
bredis and penny bredis gud and fresche stuf haldinge pace xxiiij vnce
the ij d' layf and xij d' vnce the j d' brede /
Al broustaris haue gude ayle provabile aile for xij d' the gallone
and vthir aile for viij d' the gallone redy / Ale flessaris haue
flesche redy beyf and mutone haile stuf / Ande nay fischearis hous'
nor Sele nay fische to the tyme thai present the mercat And' that
nane tak vphand' to Sele brede aile fische nor flesche derar than
the statutis was and Is vndir the pane of law

the samyn day Jonhne Wormet grantit In opin court haldin be the
balyeis him awand' to Androw Wentone xvj s' quhilkis the balyeis
chargit him to pay within terme of law

the samyn day it was fundin and deliuerit be ane assis' alexander
rede talisman that clays quhit skippar of the bus' wrangit
in the outhaldin of Jonhne lammyntonis gudis out of his schip
quhen thai was offerit and to amend' as law wile becaus' he
was his frauchtis man and in his chartir party

the saide day It was deliuerit be ane assis' Alexander rede talisman that
Jonhne Waus in futy sal pay to William gareache eldar x s' quhilk
the balyeis chargit im to pay within terme of law And' the said'
William quyt of the fraucht clamit be the said Jonhne
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio Sexto die augusti anno quosupra

the saide day Jonhne fechat at the key grantit to pay the Some of
money contenit vnpait in his obligacion maid to Jonhne Waus producit
in Jugement within terme of law

The samyn day it was fundin and deliuerit be ane assis' thomas
mar' talisman that Jonhne Waus in futy sal pay x s' of the
kingis taxt to Androw branche

The saide day philp Dunbrek officiar' warnit and chargit thome
Wodman to comper' in the tolbutht to morne before the balyeis to
ansuer tile the borghe follouit be frere thomas Wellis apon'
him for the wranguis' halding' fra him of Sex s' of Siluer
and to vpricht the skath that he has sustenit of his gudis lokit
within the hernes barrell in the saide thomas defalt

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem
ixo die Augusti Anno quo supra

the samyne day magis stile was fundin tennent to mastir thomas
stane of ane forbutht quhile Witsonday next to cum and scho to cleithe
and Inhabite the samyn with hir gudis or ellis to fynd' him caucion
for his ayris maile ande the saide mastir thomas sal mak the saide
hous' sufficient

The saide day patrik andirson was conuikit be ane assis' for
the wranguis' strubulance of Richerd hile eldar and to amend' as law
and to forbeir in tyme to cum

The samyne day it was statut ordanit and deliuerit be the aldirman balyeis ande
diuers' of the Consale gif euire patrik andirson beis conuikit for strubulance
of Richerde hill eldare or of ony vthir nichtbure in tyme to Cum he sal pay
jC s' to the bigin of Sanct Nicholes' werk Ande the towne to writ to the
kingis hienes for reformacion to be hed' for his iniuris
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos xvij die Augusti anno quo supra

The samyn day Jonhne lammynton' perofferit his gudis landis and annuellis rentis
redy to William blinsele balye to be demanyt as law will to the frethin' of him
of the borrougange of thomas Wodman to Androw murray eldar for his parte
eftir the tenour of the akis obefore

the samyn day Jonhne slugy thomsone grantit him awand' to Walter auchnywe
tua li' g' and xv s' g' flandris money quhilkis the ballieis chargit him
pay within terme of law

the samyn day the aldirman ballieis and diuers' of the consal and communite of abirdene
representand' the body of the towne grantit the patronage of Sanct Nini
anis altar to William meldrum of fywe and to his ayris maile lauchfullie
gottin of his bodie and to be gottyne the saide William gevin in Augmen
tacion and eking' of the saide chaplanry to sere Robert leis perpetual chaplan
of the samyn and his successouris fiwe merkis of annuell Rent tharof xl s'
of the landis of wattirton' beside Ellone and tua merkis of ardefork ande
grantit thar common Sele tharapone the said William deliueringe his chartir
of new Infeftment of the said fiwe merkis to giddir with the annuellis
of the ald' infeftment to the said chaplan And' eftir the said sere Robertis deces'
the said William sal euire present ane sufficient chaplan that be
ane sangastar and chorist conuenient for the vphaldin of diwin seruice
in the queir' of Abirdene quhilk sal mak continuale residence ande
seruice in the samyn And' atour gyf the saidis William and his ayris male beis
sleuthtfull ony tymes quhen the said chaplanry vakis and puntis nocht ane
sufficient chorist within xl dais thareftir thane it salbe lesum to the aldirman
balyeis consale ande Communite of abirdene frely to dispone tharapone at that
tyme ande to present ane conuenient mane for the samyn to the vphaldin
of goddis seruice as saide is
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xix die Augusti anno quo supra

the samyn day Williame ramsay grantit him awand' to Jonhne Knollis
xj f' and j pc' of beir' And' quhar' the saide Williame clamit Jonhne
of Knollis iij barrelis and demi of malt the balyeis assignit the xx day of this
Instant monetht to prewe that the said Jhone is awand' him the said malt

the samyne day it was deliuerit be ane assis' Jonhne fechat talisman
anent the debat of certane vntale betuix the merchande callit lutkyne
and the skippar of copmanhawin callit brande peter that the lx bollis
of Ry sauld be the said merchande salbe allouit in his awne hande
and the remanent of the wntale salbe diuidit betuix thaim sauld' and vnsauld'

Thomas prat offerit him redy to pay his fraucht to the skippar that is
sex crovnis for the last

the samyn day it was deliuerit be ane assis' Jonhne fechat talisman
that clays skippar sale allow alsmekile for the gudis that he has atour
his portaige as he takis for the last fra the merchandis and his last salbe
nay mair' nay the merchandis last

The samyn day it was deliuerit be ane assis' Jonhne fechat talisman
that the merchandis contenit in the chartir party maid betuix clays quhit
mastir vndir god of the litill bus' and tham sal pay the skipparis fraucht
eftir the tenour of the samyne
